channel.title: Momibello Recording Company PodCast
channel.itunes:author: Sasha Loobkoff
channel.itunes:subtitle: Our favorite indie bands play their best tunes.
channel.description:
The Momibello PodCast. A collection of some our favorite bands.
We are an online record store featuring Solea, Last Days of April, Communique, Cutlass Supreme, The Fakers, Speed not Steel, Theory of Ruin and Samiam. We will update the podcast frequently with both bands on and off our roster.
Enjoy!

item.title: Momibello one
item.itunes:author: Sasha Loobkoff
item.itunes:subtitle: This edition features Spoon, Doves, Knapsack, Swervdriver, etc...
item.description:
This Edition's Track Listing:
Spoon :: "Me and the Bean" :: girls can tell :: merge records :: 2000 Doves :: "Snowden" :: some cities :: astralworks 2005 Venus Beads :: "You Wish" :: shackled e.p. :: equator records :: 1994 Pedro the Lion :: "Rehearsal" :: control :: jade tree :: 2002 Last Days of April :: "Two Hands and Ten Fingers" :: angel youth :: bad taste records :: 2001 Interpol :: "Untitled" :: turn on the bright lights :: matador records :: 2002 Knapsack :: "Cinema Stare" :: this conversation is ending starting right now :: alias records :: 1998 Pavement :: "Date with Ikea" :: brighten the corners :: matador records :: 1997 Sparklehorse :: "Saturday" :: vivadixiesubmarinetransmissionplot :: capitol records :: 1995 Swervedriver :: "Duress" :: mezcal head :: creation records :: 1992 My Bloody Valentine :: "Sometimes" :: loveless :: creation records :: 1991
